Creating client-side programs

10 months ago

Synopsis

The easiest way to create client-side plugins is to use the script GenerateClientProgram.py which creates a new plugin based on a simple template.

  1. Create the new plugin

    cd util-scripts\templates
    python GenerateClientProgram.py "HelloType" "HelloWorldViewer"

    Generating: ../src/saturn/client/workspace/HelloTypeWO.hx
    Generated: ../src/saturn/core/HelloType.hx
    Generated: ../src/saturn/client/programs/HelloWorldViewer.hx
    Updating: ../src/saturn/app/SaturnClient.hx

  2. Compile the output

    cd $saturn
    haxe build.hxml # or Ctrl + F9 in IntelliJ

  3. Start SATurn

    cd $saturn\build\rundebugsaturn.bat

  4. Open your web-browser at http://localhost:8091/ to view the new plugin

    Normally you have to clear your browser cache first. In Chrome you hold-down the refresh button and click on "Empty cache & hard reload"

  5. You should see a new button at the bottom of the SATurn window

  6. Clicking this button will open your new plugin

For a detailed description of how client-side plugins work see Client-side programs
